name: Santas Mayhem
description:
This game was made for Trijam #151 in about 3 hours. The theme was  3 ghosts (past, present, future)

Defeat future versions of Santa and try not to be killed by your past version! Survive as long as you can and share your score in comments

Controls:

WASD/ Arrows - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shot

Tips:

- You can't kill your past version (green).

- Your past version can kill your future versions  (blue).

- Your past version can block attack from your future versions.
